name: EKSA E3000 USB 7.1 Surround Sound Gaming Headphone

It uses the omnidirectional microphone in order to pick up voices from all around. The 360-degree design of the microphone makes it easier to adjust the mic position. The noise-canceling mic can pick up voices clearly by filtering out noises. The ski-band headband of EKSA E3000 Gaming Headphones distributes the over-head pressure and is adjustable to make the headset fit your head perfectly. The EKSA E3000 Gaming Headset comes with a 2.2 meters long 3.5mm audio cable which is compatible with PS4, Xbox One Controller, PC, Laptop, Tablet, iMac, Computer, Mobile Phone, and other devices. The EKSA E3000 comes with no warranty.

name: PHILIPS 18.5” 193V5LSB2 LED MONITOR
description: SmartContrast for rich black details: Smart Contrast for rich black details Smart Contrast is a Philips technology that analyzes the contents you are displaying, automatically adjusting colors and controlling back-light intensity to dynamically enhance contrast for the best digital images and videos or when playing games where dark hues are displayed. When Economy mode is selected, contrast is adjusted and back-lighting fine-tuned for just-right display of everyday office applications and lower power consumption    LED technology for vivid colors: White LED's are solid state devices which light up to full, consistent brightness faster saving startup time. LED's are free from mercury content which allows for eco-friendly recycling and disposal process. LED's allow for better dimming control of LCD back light, resulting in super high contrast ratio. It also gives superior color reproduction thanks to consistent brightness across the screen.Easy display performance tuning with SmartControl Lite: SmartControl Liteis the next generation 3D icon based GUI monitor control software. name: XP-Pen Star-G960S Digital Drawing Graphics Tablet
description: The XP-Pen Star G960S comes with a 9 x 6 inch working area, offering you more space and more freedom to express your creative ideas. The XP-Pen Star G960S works with common Microsoft Office software like Word, PowerPoint, OneNote, and more. It supports digital inking in Microsoft Office, allowing you to simultaneously write with ink and visually present your handwritten notes and signature–ideal for your paperless office or online teaching needs. The Star G960S supports connection with Android tablets and mobile phones, letting you go wherever your ideas take you and stay productive on the go. It works with most software such as ibis Paint X, FlipaClip, Medibang, Autodesk Sketchbook, Zenbrush, Artrage, and more. Features four customizable shortcut keys, allowing you to tailor your shortcuts to your preferences and create with maximum convenience and efficiency. The Battery-Free Stylus Pen does not require batteries or charging and supports long hours of uninterrupted drawing. With 8,192 levels of pressure sensitivity, the stylus naturally presents lines of various widths and enables more exquisite expression of lines and strokes with ease. The stylus supports up to 60 degrees of tilt function to enable a natural and smooth tilt brush effect, bringing you a familiar writing and drawing experience. The XP-Pen Star G960S supports a rotation of 0, 90, 180, and 270 degrees. Now you can set out to what you want to be! The XP-Pen Star G960S is compatible with Windows 10/8/7, Mac OS X 10.10 and above, Android 6.0 and above. Also works with many major software such as Photoshop, SAI, Painter, Illustrator, Clip Studio, GIMP, Medibang, Krita, Fire Alpaca, Blender 3D and more.

name: Symphony Z22
description: Symphony Z22 comes with 6.52 inches HD+ IPS screen. It has a Full-View waterdrop-notch design. The back camera is of dual 13+2 MP with autofocus, LED Flash, portrait mode, night mode etc. and HD video recording. The front camera is of 5 MP. Symphony Z22 comes with 5000 mAh battery. It has 2 GB RAM, 1.6 GHz octa-core CPU and IMG GE8322 GPU. It is powered by unspecified chipset. The device comes with 32 GB internal storage and MicroSD slot. There is a back-mounted fingerprint sensor in this phone.

name: Huion H320m 2 In 1 Graphic Tablet
description: Huion H320m 2 In 1 Graphics Tablet is available in Bangladesh.It has 5080 Lpi resolution with a Battery-free Electromagnetic Resonance pen.One of the lightweight graphics tablet only 450g. Total Tablet length 305.4mm with Plastics and ABS material.It has 11 Programmable Press Keys and a Reports rate of 266PPS.The highest pen resolution is 5080 LPI.Huion H320m 2 In 1 Graphic Tablet comes with 01 year warranty.

name: Starex 19” NB Wide Led TV Monitor
description: Starex 19NB 19 Full HD Wide LED Television featured with 19 inch (Wide) Display Resulation: 1920 x 1080 LED contrast Ratio: 100000:1 Cristal Clear Display Slim Design. This television has built in Speaker Interface: USB, VGA and HDMI Smart Enargy Saving. The Starex 17NB 17 Wide LED Television comes with 01 year warranty

name: Havit HV-H2116D 3.5mm Stereo Headphone (Dual Port)
description: Havit HV-H2116D 3.5mm Stereo Headphone comes with microphone Dual port connestor. This new Headphone is featured with Speaker diameter: 40 mm, Speaker Frequency Response: 20 Hz - 20 kHz, Speaker Input Impedance: 32 Ohms, Speaker Sensitivity: 110 dB, Connection 3.5 mm connector (plug), Volume and Mute Controls, Cable length: 2 m. It also has Noise Cancelling, Headset with Crystal Clear Hi-Fi Sound and Microphone. It's pad is leather with adjustable headband, offering great comfort. This new Havit HV-H2116D headphone is compatible with PC, Mac, smartphones, tablets, etc.

name: Acer Aspire 3 A315-58 Core i3 11th Gen 15.6 FHD Laptop
description: Acer Aspire 3 A315-58 Laptop powered by Intel Core i3-1115G4 Processor (6M Cache, 3.00 GHz up to 4.10 GHz) with Intel UHD Graphics. Its 6M Cache, 3.00 GHz up to 4.10 GHz. Acer Aspire 3 A315-58 having 15.6 FHD (1920x1080),ComfyView, LED display attractively designed. This Acer Laptop has 4GB 2666MHz DDR4 RAM and also contains 1TB SATA HDD storage to ensure greater compatibility. In addition, it has some enhanced components such as, Microphone, 2 speakers, Keyboard with touch pad Multi-touch Gesture. If we come to its connectivity, it has all type of connectivity like HDMI x 1, 1 x USB 2.0, USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A Ports x 2, 1 x Network (RJ-45), IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac, Gigabit Ethernet and Bluetooth 5.0 etc. This Acer Laptop is enormous with 2-cell Lithium Ion (Li-Ion) battery, that can provide longer backup on the move and the approximate weight of only 1.80 kg will ensure portability. The latest Acer Aspire 3 A315-58 laptop comes with 02 years warranty.

name: Havit HV-139D 3.5mm Stereo Headphone Black (Double Port /Single Port)
description: The HV-139D Headphone is Used for Phone and computer and has full-size form factor. It has a Stereo sound output mode. It has a Frequency Response of 20-20000Hz. The headphone uses ABS Plastic and has an adjustable Headband. It has 3.5mm Jack for easy connection and is fully wired. The mic that it has uses Boom Technology to absorb sound.

name: Vivo Y15s
description: Vivo Y15s comes with 6.51 inches HD+ IPS LCD screen. It has a Full-View waterdrop notch design. The back camera is of dual 13+2 MP with Autofocus, depth sensor, LED flash etc. and Full HD video recording. The front camera is of 8 MP. Vivo Y15s comes with 5000 mAh battery with 10W fast charging. It has 3 GB RAM, up to 2.3 GHz octa-core CPU and PowerVR GE8320 GPU. It is powered by a MediaTek Helio P35 (12nm) chipset. The device comes with 32 GB internal storage and dedicated MicroSD slot. There is a side-mounted fingerprint sensor in this phone.

name: AOC E970SWHEN 18.5 HDMI LED Monitor
description: Slim, energy-saving, compact 18.5-inch LED display, 12.6 mm narrow frame, simple and low-key hairline texture design body. The 20000000:1 (DCR) ultra-high dynamic contrast ensures that many darker image details can be displayed. e-Saver software reduces power consumption. Support for HDMI high-quality input interface allows you to enjoy the contents of other electronic devices on the AOC display. Korea than technology, highest contrast using DCR (Dynamic Contrast Ratio) amounted to 20 million: 1, make the picture details sharper, more vivid outline, more distinct levels. Mercury is toxic and can cause toxic substances to pollute the environment. Unlike traditional CCFL backlights, this LED- backlit screen features a mercury-free green panel. Compared with the traditional 4CCFL screen, it can achieve up to 50% energy saving. e-Saver software can automatically determine the operating status of the computer (screen protection / shutdown / sleep), users can set the display shutdown time according to demand, in order to achieve energy saving and extend the life of the display. Designed with a unique hairline texture to provide a more elegant and elegant texture. Screen+ software is a tool that cuts the desktop screen. It splits your desktop into different windows and allows each window to display different execution images. Simply drag the displayed application to a blank split window and you can use it directly. This software function allows your desktop to display multiple windows at the same time and perform different tasks. Please use the software to download and install according to the manual. The user can easily adjust the display parameters with the mouse through vivid images, and the adjustment process becomes simpler and more interesting. The ultra-narrow bezel design of 12.6mm increases the area ratio of the visible area.

name: Edifier H650 On-Ear Wired Headphone
description: The Edifier H650 features large 40mm neodymium drivers and has a collapsible design. Its compact design folds up to make it even more convenient to store and transport. It comes with a flexible headband made with reinforced steel that provides both comfort and lasting toughness. It produces sound with crisp highs and deep lows. It also has a noise-isolation feature. You can enjoy your music properly.

name: Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i Core i3 10th Gen 15.6 HD Laptop with Windows 11
description: The Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i powered by Intel Core i3-1005G1 Processor (4M Cache,1.20 GHz up to 3.40 GHz, 4 MB Cache, 4 Threads) with Intel UHD Graphics. This 10th Gen Intel Core processors and discrete graphics options fuel speedy performance, easy multitasking, and great entertainment experience. Thoughtful design details like the physical webcam security shutter complete the picture. This Lenovo IdeaPad Slim 3i designed with One memory soldered to systemboard, one DDR4 SO-DIMM slot, dual-channel capable, Here added 4GB DDR4 SODIMM 2667MHz RAM and 1TB HDD 5400rpm. This new IdeaPad Slim 3i Laptop comes with Narrow bezels on two sides make the most of the 15.6 IdeaPad Slim 3i’s up to 15.6″ HD (1366×768) TN 220nits Anti-glare display and give the laptop itself a clean with contemporary look. This Lenovo Laptop comes with Dual speakers with Dolby Audio optimize sound so you’ll love what you hear as well as what you see. The IdeaPad Slim 3i laptop is packed with advanced technology, but sometimes the straightforward approach works best, The webcam designed with a physical shutter. When you’re done with your video chat, simply close the shutter and make your webcam hacker-proof. The Latest IdeaPad Slim 3i comes with 2 years International Limited Warranty (Terms & condition Apply As Per Lenovo)

name: Havit H763D Gaming Headphone Black
description: Havit H763D is a Gaming Headphone available in Black Color. This is a Wired Headphone that utilizes 3.5mm audio jacks for connectivity. The headphone cord has a length of 1.8m. It is available in both single and dual headphone plug versions. Both Plug Setups utilizes 3.5MM audio jack for connectivity. This headset has a foldable Omnidirectional Microphone. the microphone dimensions are 6 x 5 mm. The Frequency Response is ranged from 20hz to 20Khz. The Sensitivity reading of this Headphone is 108dB. But it can have a slight ±3 dB distortion. The Impedance  reading is 16 Ohm. The impendance can have a slight ±15% flactuation. The Speakers are 40MM. The overall dimensions are 91.9 x 203.6 x 158mm. Havit H763D Gaming Headphone Black offers 1 year of Warranty.

name: Infinix Hot 11 Play
description: Infinix Hot 11 Play comes with 6.82 inches HD+ IPS LCD screen. It has a waterdrop notch front camera design. The back camera is of triple 48+2 Megapixel + AI with PDAF, quad-LED flash, HDR etc. and Full HD video recording. The front camera is of 8 MP. Infinix Hot 11 Play comes with 6000 mAh big battery with 10W fast charging. It has 4 or 6 GB RAM, up to 2 GHz octa-core CPU and Mali-G52 MC2 GPU. It is powered by a Mediatek Helio G85 (12 nm) chipset. The device comes with 64 or 128 GB internal storage and dedicated MicroSD slot. There is a back-mounted fingerprint sensor in this phone.

name: ASUS VivoBook 15 X515EA Core i3 11th Gen 15.6 IPS FHD Laptop
description: ASUS VivoBook 15 X515EA FHD Laptop comes with Intel Core i3-1115G4 Processor (6M Cache, 3.00 GHz up to 4.10 GHz) and 4GB DDR4 3200MHz SDRAM onboard. It features a 512GB PCI-E G3 SSD. It is integrated with Intel UHD Graphics. It has a 15.6-inch, FHD (1920 x 1080) 16:9, Anti-glare display, LED Backlit, 250nits, NTSC: 45%, Screen-to-body ratio: 83 % Display. It supports Windows 10 Home. It has been designed with 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-A, 1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type-C, 2x USB 2.0 Type-A, 1x HDMI 1.4, 1x 3.5mm Combo Audio Jack, 1x DC-in, and a Micro SD card reader. It features a Chiclet Keyboard with Num-key and it has a 1.4mm Key-travel. It has a VGA camera and a built-in microphone. It comes with a built-in speaker and it features Audio by ICEpower. It is featured with Wi-Fi 5(802.11ac)+Bluetooth 4.1 (Dual-band) for better connectivity. It is powered by a 37WHrs, 2S1P, 2-cell Li-ion battery. The weight of the laptop is only 1.80 kg and it is very easy to carry anywhere. This laptop has a 2 years International Limited Warranty (Battery & Adapter)

name: Oppo A16
description: Oppo A16 comes with 6.52 inches HD+ screen. It has a Full-View waterdrop notch design. The back camera is of triple 13+2+2 MP with LED flash, PDAF, depth sensor, macro camera etc. and Full HD video recording. The front camera is of 8 MP. Oppo A16 comes with 5000 mAh battery with 10W fast charging solution. It has 3 or 4 GB RAM, up to 2.35 GHz octa-core CPU and PowerVR GE8320 GPU. It is powered by a Mediatek Helio G35 (12nm) chipset. The device comes with 32 or 64 GB internal storage and MicroSD slot. There is a back-mounted fingerprint sensor in this phone.
